summary: Updated AI Bot section styling: Changed inner shadow from black to white (rgba(255,255,255,0.3)), increased blur from 0px to 20px, reduced name and lastname input widths from 215px to 180px to fit phone number in same line, moved glass box lower from top-[200px] to top-[240px], and swapped positions of interests and phone number fields (interests now comes before phone number).
current_status: AI Bot section styling updated with white inner shadows, increased blur, narrower input fields, lower glass box position, and reordered form fields. Ready for browser testing.
